name: You can't hole it
description:
DAE - Virtual Easter Jam

Want to give your shot at holes in 1?

Goof around with your friends by placing objects on the map, which will have map interaction!

Controls (XBOX Controller)

Placement Phase:

  • Left Joystick: Move Placement Controller
  • Right Joystick: Rotate Object
  • A Button: Place Object (on course)

Shooting Phase:

  • Left Joystick: Aim Golf Ball
  • A button: Shoot Golf Ball
